translations: n.风信子；蓝铃花（bluebell 的复数）

phrs.translation: 蓝铃花, 风信子, 风铃草, 野风信子
还有那晚冬的野风信子

sentences.sentence: Near together in patches the bluebells were nodding gently in the breeze.
sentences.translation: 一丛丛风信子在微风中轻轻摇曳。

sentences.sentence: Outside in the garden, stood Anne and Diana, looking shyly at each other over a cluster of bluebells.
sentences.translation: 外面的花园里，安妮和黛安娜站在一簇风信子后面，害羞地对视着。

sentences.sentence: Oh, if I could only pick some of those bluebells!
sentences.translation: 啊，要是我能摘到一些风信子就好了！
